column27: Create a routing system in React using react-router and create base pages for dashboard, login, sign up, forgot password

As a recruiter, I want to upload a new job listing to the system so that candidates can view and apply for the position.

h3. Acceptance Test 1: Successful Job Listing Submission

* *Given* the recruiter is logged into the system,
* *When* the recruiter fills out all required job listing fields (e.g., title, description, requirements, location) and submits the form,
* *Then* the system should store the job listing in the database and display a confirmation message that the listing has been successfully created.

h3. Acceptance Test 2: Validation of Job Listing Fields

* *Given* the recruiter is filling out the job listing form,
* *When* the recruiter tries to submit the form with missing required fields (e.g., title, description),
* *Then* the system should display error messages next to the missing fields and prevent submission until all required fields are completed.



!image-20241011-022129.png|width=1359,height=736,alt="image-20241011-022129.png"!

Title: View Billing History  
   Description: As a user or recruiter, I want to view my billing history so that I can track all my past payments and subscription details.  
     - Task 1: As a developer, I want to implement an API that retrieves billing history from the database using Fastify and Prisma.
     - Task 2: As a frontend developer, I want to display billing history in a table format using React and Material UI, so that users can view their past payments.



!image-20241011-020402.png|width=1174,height=851,alt="image-20241011-020402.png"!

Title: Analyze Resumes Against Job Description  
   Description: As a recruiter, I want to view the analysis results of resumes against a specific job description so that I can easily identify the most suitable candidates.  
     - Task 1: As a developer, I want to implement a backend service that analyzes and ranks resumes based on job descriptions using Fastify and Prisma.
     - Task 2: As a frontend developer, I want to create a UI to display the analysis and ranking of resumes using React and Material UI.



!image-20241011-021554.png|width=1128,height=887,alt="image-20241011-021554.png"!

Title: Upload Resume Against Job Description  
   Description: As a recruiter, I want to upload a job description and then upload multiple resumes against it, so that the system can match and analyze the resumes according to the job requirements.  
     - Task 1: As a developer, I want to create an API that allows recruiters to upload job descriptions and resumes using Fastify.
     - Task 2: As a frontend developer, I want to create a form that allows recruiters to upload job descriptions and resumes using React.

!image-20241011-021531.png|width=1008,height=993,alt="image-20241011-021531.png"!

column27:
As a user, I want to reset my password if I forget it, so that I can regain access to my account.

*Acceptance Test 1: Password Reset Request*

* *Given* a user is on the login page and clicks the "Forgot Password" link,
* *When* the user provides their registered email and submits the form,
* *Then* the system should send a password reset link to the provided email address and display a confirmation message.

*Acceptance Test 2: Password Reset Confirmation*

* *Given* the user has received the password reset email and clicked the reset link,
* *When* the user is redirected to the password reset form and enters a new password,
* *Then* the system should validate the password, update it successfully, and display a confirmation message that the password has been reset.

!image-20241011-013329.png|width=922,height=1085,alt="image-20241011-013329.png"!

column1: Task 2: As a frontend developer, I want to create a search interface with filters using React and Material UI, so that users can easily search for jobs.

Task 2: As a frontend developer, I want to design the resume upload form using React and Material UI, so that users can submit their resumes conveniently.
Task 1: As a developer, I want to create an API endpoint for resume uploads using Fastify, so that users can upload their resumes.
Task 2: As a developer, I want to fetch user specific data from the backend using Prisma, so that the dashboard displays relevant information.
Task 1: As a frontend developer, I want to design the dashboard layout using React and Material UI, so that the user interface is user friendly.

column27:
As a recruiter, I want to be able to upload multiple resumes to the system so that I can efficiently analyze and shortlist candidates.



*Acceptance Test 1: Backend Bulk Resume Upload*

* *Given* the Fastify backend service is running,
* *When* a recruiter uploads multiple resumes in a single request,
* *Then* the backend should successfully process the files, store them securely, and return a confirmation response indicating the success of the upload.

*Acceptance Test 2: Frontend Bulk Resume Upload Interface*

* *Given* the bulk resume upload interface is displayed,
* *When* a recruiter selects or drags and drops multiple resumes and clicks the upload button,
* *Then* the system should display a progress bar, and after upload completion, show a success or failure message for each file uploaded.



!image-20241011-013227.png|width=1091,height=917,alt="image-20241011-013227.png"!

column27:
As a recruiter, I want to shortlist resumes that match my job listings to identify the most qualified candidates for the role.



*Acceptance Tests:* 



# First Acceptance Test: 

Given  that the recruiter is on the List Resumes page with multiple resumes displayed

When  they select some resumes and press the shortlist icon

Then the selected resumes should be added to their shortlist, and a confirmation message should appear



# Second Acceptance Test: 

Given  that the recruiter has not selected any resumes

When  they press the shortlist icon

Then they should receive a message indicating no resumes were selected, and no action should be taken





!image-20241011-023403.png|width=1166,height=857,alt="image-20241011-023403.png"!

As a user, I want to be able to manage and update my profile details, so that my information is accurate and up to date within the system.

 *Acceptance Tests:* 

# First Acceptance Test: 

Given that the user is on the Manage Profile page

When they update their account details (name, date of birth) and press the update button

Then their profile should be updated, and a confirmation message should display the updated information.


# Second Acceptance Test: 

Given  that the user leaves the required fields blank

When they press the update button

Then they should see validation error messages, and the profile should not be updated.



!image-20241011-003059.png|width=922,height=1085,alt="image-20241011-003059.png"!

As a user, I want to view the analysis of my uploaded resume to understand how my profile matches my job requirements and areas for improvement

 *Acceptance Tests:* 

# First Acceptance Test: 

Given  that the user is on the View Resume Analysis page and has uploaded resumes

When  the user selects an existing resume

Then they should see the analysis results for that resume, including optimization suggestions


# Second Acceptance Test: 

Given  that the user uploads a new resume on the View Resume Analysis page

When  the upload is complete

Then they should see the analysis for the new resume without navigating away from the page



!image-20241011-020622.png|width=1295,height=772,alt="image-20241011-020622.png"!

Description: As a job seeker, I want to be able to apply to job listings with my uploaded resume so that I can increase my chances of being considered for a role.  
     - Task 1: As a developer, I want to implement an API that allows users to apply to job listings using Fastify.
     - Task 2: As a frontend developer, I want to create an "Apply" button on job listing pages using React and Material UI, so that users can easily apply to jobs.



!image-20241011-023134.png|width=1081,height=925,alt="image-20241011-023134.png"!

Description: As a registered user, I want to log in using my credentials so that I can access my personalized dashboard and other features securely.  
     - Task 1: As a developer, I want to set up user authentication with Keycloak and OAuth 2.0, so that secure login is enabled.
     - Task 2: As a frontend developer, I want to design the login page using React and Material UI, so that users can log in easily.





!image-20241011-003020.png|width=922,height=1085,alt="image-20241011-003020.png"!

Description: As a potential user, I want to be able to create an account by providing my basic information, so that I can gain access to the system's features and manage my profile.  

# Task 1: As a developer, I want to implement an API endpoint for user creation using Fastify, so that users can register to the system.
# Task 2: As a frontend developer, I want to design and integrate the user registration form using React and Material UI, so that the user can input their information easily.





!image-20241011-002844.png|width=922,height=1085,alt="image-20241011-002844.png"!

Description: As a job seeker, I want to search for available job opportunities based on my skills and preferences, so that I can apply to relevant positions.



Task 1: As a developer, I want to implement job search functionality using Fastify and Prisma. 

Task 2: As a frontend developer, I want to create a search interface with filters using React and Material UI, so that users can easily search for jobs.

!image-20241011-022221.png|width=1255,height=797,alt="image-20241011-022221.png"!

Description: As a user, I want to be able to upload my resume in a standard format, so that the system can analyze my information and provide relevant insights for potential job opportunities.



Task 1: As a developer, I want to create an API endpoint for resume uploads using Fastify, so that users can upload their resumes.

Task 2: As a frontend developer, I want to design the resume upload form using React and Material UI, so that users can submit their resumes conveniently.



!image-20241011-014910.png|width=1091,height=917,alt="image-20241011-014910.png"!

Description: As a user, I want to see a clear and intuitive dashboard layout upon logging in, so that I can easily navigate through the system's features and access relevant information.



Task 1: As a frontend developer, I want to design the dashboard layout using React and Material UI, so that the user interface is user friendly.

Task 2: As a developer, I want to fetch user specific data from the backend using Prisma, so that the dashboard displays relevant information.


!image-20241011-050136.png|width=1239,height=807,alt="image-20241011-050136.png"!

As a user or recruiter, I want to make payments securely for the chosen subscription plan so that I can continue using the services without interruption.

 

Task 1: API for Payment  

As a developer, I want to integrate a payment gateway (Stripe/PayPal) with Fastify, so that users can make payments securely.

  

Task 2: Frontend Payment Form  

As a frontend developer, I want to create a payment form using React and Material UI, so that users can input their payment details.



!image-20241011-010007.png|width=1110,height=901,alt="image-20241011-010007.png"!

As a user or recruiter, I want to be able to unsubscribe from my current plan when I no longer need it, so that I stop recurring payments.

 

Task 1: API for Unsubscription  

As a developer, I want to create an API to handle unsubscriptions using Fastify.

 

Task 2: Frontend Unsubscription Interface  

As a front-end developer, I want to add an "Unsubscribe" button to the user’s profile page using React and Material UI, so that users can easily unsubscribe from their plan.





!image-20241011-005940.png|width=1110,height=901,alt="image-20241011-005940.png"!

As a user or recruiter, I want to be able to subscribe to a suitable plan so that I can access premium features and functionalities offered by the platform.

 

 

Task 1: API for Subscription  

As a developer, I want to implement subscription functionality using Fastify, integrating with a payment gateway (Stripe/PayPal).

 

Task 2: Frontend Subscription Management  

As a front-end developer, I want to design a subscription management interface using React and Material UI, so that users can easily subscribe to different plans.



!image-20241011-005023.png|width=1245,height=803,alt="image-20241011-005023.png"!
